__inputs.name: DS_MYSQL_LDAS
__inputs.label: MySQL-Ldas
__inputs.description: MySQL datasource for infrastructure monitoring data

description: UC-IT-01: Predictive Infrastructure Monitoring using SPC-based anomaly detection. Monitors Redis, RDS, and ECS fleet health scores, z-score anomalies, and capacity trends across all instances.

panels.description: Total number of active infrastructure instances across all service types

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CONCAT(service_type, ':', instance_id)) as value 
FROM test.infra_fleet_inventory 
WHERE status = 'ACTIVE'

panels.title: Total Instances / 实例总数

panels.description: Average composite health score across all instances on the latest date

targets.rawSql:
SELECT ROUND(AVG(composite_score), 1) as value 
FROM test.infra_health_scores 
WHERE metric_date = (SELECT MAX(metric_date) FROM test.infra_health_scores)

panels.title: Fleet Health Score / 设施健康评分

panels.description: Number of unacknowledged anomaly alerts in the past 7 days

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(*) as value 
FROM test.infra_anomaly_alerts 
WHERE acknowledged = FALSE 
AND alert_date >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)

panels.title: Active Alerts / 活跃告警

panels.description: Number of distinct service types being actively monitored

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT service_type) as value 
FROM test.infra_fleet_inventory 
WHERE status = 'ACTIVE'

panels.title: Services Monitored / 监控服务数

panels.description: Percentage of instances with active monitoring sources configured

targets.rawSql:
SELECT ROUND(
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN monitoring_source IS NOT NULL THEN instance_id END) * 100.0 
    / NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT instance_id), 0)
, 1) as value
FROM test.infra_fleet_inventory

panels.title: Coverage % / 覆盖率

panels.description: Average absolute z-score across all metrics on the latest date. Values above 2 indicate widespread anomalies.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT ROUND(AVG(ABS(z_score)), 2) as value 
FROM test.infra_anomaly_scores 
WHERE metric_date = (SELECT MAX(metric_date) FROM test.infra_anomaly_scores)

panels.title: Avg Z-Score / 平均Z分数

panels.description: Health score heatmap showing individual dimension scores for each instance. Sorted by lowest composite score first.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    CONCAT(h.service_type, ' / ', h.instance_name) as "Instance",
    h.availability_score as "Avail",
    h.performance_score as "Perf",
    h.capacity_score as "Cap",
    h.error_rate_score as "Error",
    h.latency_score as "Latency",
    h.composite_score as "Overall",
    h.health_grade as "Grade"
FROM test.infra_health_scores h
WHERE h.metric_date = (SELECT MAX(metric_date) FROM test.infra_health_scores)
    AND h.service_type IN ($service_type)
ORDER BY h.composite_score ASC
LIMIT 20

panels.title: Health Heatmap / 健康热力图

panels.description: Average composite health score trend by service type over the selected time range

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    h.metric_date as time,
    h.service_type as metric,
    ROUND(AVG(h.composite_score), 1) as value
FROM test.infra_health_scores h
WHERE h.metric_date >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL $timerange DAY)
    AND h.service_type IN ($service_type)
GROUP BY h.metric_date, h.service_type
ORDER BY h.metric_date

panels.title: Service Health Trends / 服务健康趋势

panels.description: Top 10 Redis instances by memory usage in GB

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    m.instance_name as metric,
    ROUND(m.metric_value / 1073741824, 2) as value
FROM test.infra_metric_daily m
WHERE m.service_type = 'REDIS'
    AND m.metric_name = 'memory_used_bytes'
    AND m.metric_date = (SELECT MAX(metric_date) FROM test.infra_metric_daily WHERE service_type = 'REDIS')
ORDER BY m.metric_value DESC
LIMIT 10

panels.title: Redis Memory Usage Top 10 / 内存使用前10

panels.description: Top 10 Redis instances by connected client count

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    m.instance_name as metric,
    m.metric_value as value
FROM test.infra_metric_daily m
WHERE m.service_type = 'REDIS'
    AND m.metric_name = 'connected_clients'
    AND m.metric_date = (SELECT MAX(metric_date) FROM test.infra_metric_daily WHERE service_type = 'REDIS')
ORDER BY m.metric_value DESC
LIMIT 10

panels.title: Redis Connection Counts Top 10 / 连接数前10

panels.description: Bottom 10 Redis instances by cache hit rate percentage. Lower hit rate may indicate inefficient caching.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    m.instance_name as metric,
    ROUND(m.metric_value * 100, 1) as value
FROM test.infra_metric_daily m
WHERE m.service_type = 'REDIS'
    AND m.metric_name = 'hit_rate'
    AND m.metric_date = (SELECT MAX(metric_date) FROM test.infra_metric_daily WHERE service_type = 'REDIS')
ORDER BY m.metric_value ASC
LIMIT 10

panels.title: Redis Hit Rate Bottom 10 / 命中率后10

panels.description: Top 10 RDS instances by CPU utilization percentage

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    m.instance_name as metric,
    ROUND(m.metric_value, 1) as value
FROM test.infra_metric_daily m
WHERE m.service_type = 'RDS'
    AND m.metric_name = 'cpu_utilization'
    AND m.metric_date = (SELECT MAX(metric_date) FROM test.infra_metric_daily WHERE service_type = 'RDS')
ORDER BY m.metric_value DESC
LIMIT 10

panels.title: RDS CPU Utilization Top 10 / CPU使用率前10

panels.description: Bottom 10 RDS instances by freeable memory in GB. Low free memory may indicate capacity issues.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    m.instance_name as metric,
    ROUND(m.metric_value / 1073741824, 2) as value
FROM test.infra_metric_daily m
WHERE m.service_type = 'RDS'
    AND m.metric_name = 'free_memory'
    AND m.metric_date = (SELECT MAX(metric_date) FROM test.infra_metric_daily WHERE service_type = 'RDS')
ORDER BY m.metric_value ASC
LIMIT 10

panels.title: RDS Free Memory Bottom 10 / 可用内存后10

panels.description: Read and write latency trends for RDS instances over the selected time range

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    m.metric_date as time,
    CONCAT(m.instance_name, ' - ', m.metric_name) as metric,
    ROUND(m.metric_value * 1000, 2) as value
FROM test.infra_metric_daily m
WHERE m.service_type = 'RDS'
    AND m.metric_name IN ('read_latency', 'write_latency')
    AND m.metric_date >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL $timerange DAY)
    AND m.instance_name IN ($instance)
ORDER BY m.metric_date

panels.title: RDS Latency Trends / RDS延迟趋势

panels.description: Active anomaly alerts across all infrastructure services, sorted by severity and date

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    a.alert_date as "Date",
    a.severity as "Severity",
    a.service_type as "Service",
    a.instance_id as "Instance",
    a.metric_name as "Metric",
    ROUND(a.current_value, 2) as "Value",
    ROUND(a.z_score, 2) as "Z-Score",
    a.description_en as "Description",
    CASE WHEN a.acknowledged THEN '✓' ELSE '✗' END as "Ack"
FROM test.infra_anomaly_alerts a
WHERE a.alert_date >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL $timerange DAY)
    AND a.service_type IN ($service_type)
ORDER BY 
    FIELD(a.severity, 'EMERGENCY', 'CRITICAL', 'WARNING', 'INFO'),
    a.alert_date DESC
LIMIT 50

panels.title: Active Anomaly Alerts / 活跃异常告警

panels.description: Daily count of anomaly alerts grouped by severity level over the selected time range

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    a.alert_date as time,
    a.severity as metric,
    COUNT(*) as value
FROM test.infra_anomaly_alerts a
WHERE a.alert_date >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL $timerange DAY)
GROUP BY a.alert_date, a.severity
ORDER BY a.alert_date

panels.title: Alert Trend by Severity / 告警趋势

panels.description: Recent pipeline execution history showing status, duration, and record counts

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    p.run_date as "Run Date",
    p.pipeline_name as "Pipeline",
    p.status as "Status",
    p.duration_seconds as "Duration",
    p.records_processed as "Records",
    p.error_message as "Error"
FROM test.infra_pipeline_log p
WHERE p.run_date >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 14 DAY)
ORDER BY p.run_date DESC, p.pipeline_name
LIMIT 30

panels.title: Pipeline Execution Status / 管道执行状态

panels.description: Time since last successful data collection for each monitoring source

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    f.monitoring_source as metric,
    ROUND(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, MAX(m.metric_date), CURDATE()), 1) as value
FROM test.infra_fleet_inventory f
JOIN test.infra_metric_daily m ON f.instance_id = m.instance_id AND f.service_type = m.service_type
WHERE f.monitoring_source IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY f.monitoring_source
ORDER BY value DESC

panels.title: Data Freshness by Source / 数据新鲜度

panels.description: Percentage of active instances with at least one metric collected in the past 7 days

targets.rawSql:
SELECT ROUND(
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN m.metric_date >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) THEN m.instance_id END) * 100.0
    / NULLIF((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT instance_id) FROM test.infra_fleet_inventory WHERE status = 'ACTIVE'), 0)
, 1) as value
FROM test.infra_metric_daily m
JOIN test.infra_fleet_inventory f ON m.instance_id = f.instance_id AND m.service_type = f.service_type
WHERE f.status = 'ACTIVE'

panels.title: Collection Coverage / 采集覆盖率

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT service_type FROM test.infra_fleet_inventory ORDER BY service_type
list.description: Filter by infrastructure service type (Redis, RDS, ECS, etc.)
list.label: Service Type
list.name: service_type
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT service_type FROM test.infra_fleet_inventory ORDER BY service_type

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT instance_name FROM test.infra_fleet_inventory WHERE service_type IN ($service_type) ORDER BY instance_name
list.description: Filter by specific instance name, dependent on selected service type
list.label: Instance
list.name: instance
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT instance_name FROM test.infra_fleet_inventory WHERE service_type IN ($service_type) ORDER BY instance_name

list.description: Select a metric for SPC chart and anomaly analysis
list.label: Metric
list.name: metric

list.description: Number of days to look back for trend and alert data
list.label: Days
list.name: timerange

title: UC-IT-01: Infrastructure Health Monitor / 基础设施健康监控
